name: Stick Top Shooter - Sniper Assassin Missions
name_original: Stick Top Shooter - Sniper Assassin Missions
description:
You are in the final stages of your assassin career but everything is falling apart and you are the only person who can save yourself and your team from being killed off by rival gangs!

Complete tons of different missions, each which will bring you closer to the mysterious Mr. J who wants you dead!

Make sure you don't get yourself killed while sniping! Good luck and have fun!
